content: We're focused on five key objectives to drive growth in 2022 and to set us up for growth long term; first, supporting customers with an industry-leading onboarding experience while helping them to systematically scale their use of the Proteograph Product Suite for projects of increasing size and scope; second, expanding our installed base of instruments; third, continuing to build out our commercial capabilities, geographic footprint, and team; fourth, driving our product road map and exploring more applications for our proprietary engineered nanoparticles in 2022 and beyond.
